Title: Relates to severe weather emergency response plans
Summary: Requires certain public utilities, telecommunication carriers and internet or broadband providers operating within the bounds of any county that is required to have a local comprehensive emergency management plan to create a severe weather emergency response plan and to participate with any county they operate within in a biannual disaster drill.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to severe weather emergency response plans
